com.facebook.buck.parser

Interface BuildFileParsePipeline<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of node this pipeline will produce (raw nodes, target nodes, etc)
    All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BuildFileRawNodeParsePipeline

    public interface BuildFileParsePipeline<T>
extends AutoCloseable
    Abstract node parsing pipeline. Allows implementors to define their own logic for creating nodes of type T.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default T getAllNodes(Cell cell, Path buildFile)
      Obtain all TargetNodes from a build file.
      com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<T> getAllNodesJob(Cell cell, Path buildFile)
      Asynchronously obtain all TargetNodes from a build file.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • getAllNodes

        default T getAllNodes(Cell cell,
                      Path buildFile)
               throws BuildFileParseException
        Obtain all TargetNodes from a build file. This may block if the file is not cached.
        Parameters:
        cell - the Cell that the build file belongs to.
        buildFile - absolute path to the file to process.
        Returns:
        all targets from the file
        Throws:
        BuildFileParseException - for syntax errors.

      • getAllNodesJob

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<T> getAllNodesJob(Cell cell,
                                                                     Path buildFile)
                                                              throws BuildTargetException
        Asynchronously obtain all TargetNodes from a build file. This will leverage previously cached raw contents of the file (if present) but will always loop over the contents, so repeated calls (with the same args) are not free.

        returned future may throw BuildFileParseException and HumanReadableException.

        Parameters:
        cell - the Cell that the build file belongs to.
        buildFile - absolute path to the file to process.
        Returns:
        future.
        Throws:
        BuildTargetException
